level.text: The Board may require an applicant for registration to practice as a psychology associate to be interviewed with respect to his or her past and present education and experience in relation to psychology to determine whether the applicant meets the requirements of the Act and this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 3246, 3247 (April 15, 2011); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 59 DCR 8356 (July 13, 2012).
